QuestData.Title: Spray and Prey
QuestData.Description:
The Bug Sprayer you recovered from Ormgul the Pestilent seems like it could give us an advantage against the drogbar and their insects.
Spray the Drogbar with their own alchemy and watch their insects turn against them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Bug Sprayer on drogbar in Whitewater Wash.
QuestData.CompletionText: For this group of drogbar to turn against us after so many years of peace...
QuestData.RewardText: That worked quite well. I will hold on to this Bug Sprayer; it might be useful in the battles to come.
